name: Rogue Dungeon: RPG
description:
Your main objective in this game is to find the six legendary gems in order to finish the game. You must be careful, if your energy runs out, you will not be able to walk, and the game will be over. Energy is consumed when moving around the map.

The dungeons are randomly generated, that is, no two dungeons are the same, and no two games are the same.

By defeating the monsters you will get skulls, with those skulls you can improve the chances of finding a gem on the map.
